channel.title: nosh+coffee on Cork OpenCoffee
channel.description: Recent content in nosh+coffee on Cork OpenCoffee

item.title: Cork Open Coffee in Nosh+Coffee
item.description: This week’s Cork Open Coffee will take place on Friday from 10am in a new venue, Nosh + Coffee in the Mardyke Arena in Cork. There are no talks or presentation planned this week, just open networking and coffee. The owners, Simon and his wife Jackie have generously invited Cork Open Coffee members to meet in their café, where we will all receive a complimentary coffee on arrival. And there’s Wifi too!

item.title: Photos from last OpenCoffee
item.description: Magda Lukasiewicz was at last week’s OpenCoffee in Nosh+Coffee and took some great pictures, some of which are below. Check out her site for more brilliant photography.

item.title: Should we make Nosh+Coffee our new City Location?
item.description: Should we make Nosh+Coffee our new City Location for Cork OpenCoffee? (surveys)
